content.answer: The 2021 regular season will tip off on May 14. The regular season, currently scheduled to conclude on Sunday, Sept. 19 and be followed by a traditional playoffs and Finals format, will include a break from July 15 through Aug. 11.
content.name: When does the 2021 WNBA season begin and end?
content.question: When does the 2021 WNBA season begin and end?
